fields.name: completeMessage
fields.fieldText:
Congratulations, your account and contact(s) have been created!


Click here to review all information.

fields.name: errorMessage
fields.fieldText: There was an error when creating your account. The Salesforce Admin Team has been notified.

fields.name: confirmSearchMessage
fields.fieldText: Important: By clicking next you are confirming you have searched Salesforce and the accounts / contacts you are about to create do not already exist.

fields.name: errorMessage_0
fields.fieldText:
There was an error when creating one or more of your contact(s). The Salesforce Admin Team has been notified.


Click here to view the account and contact information to continue editing.

fields.name: contactInfo
fields.fieldText:
Your account has been created! Please continue adding contacts.


Note: You must add at least one Admin contact as you need to set the account's main admin and billing contacts.

fields.name: accountAdmin
fields.helpText: Check this box for contacts who a) "own" the subscription, b) typically gets renewal notifications and/or c) have overall responsibility for account-level changes.

fields.name: billingContact
fields.helpText: In addition to Account Admins, Billing Contacts will receive invoice emails

fields.name: syncAddress
fields.fieldText: Sync Addresses with Account? Change this to -None- if changing the addresses below.
fields.helpText: If changing the addresses for the contact, change this field to None (vs Account or Site)

fields.name: noContactWarning
fields.fieldText: At least one admin contact must be added to the account.

screens.name: Set_Account_Admin_and_Billing_Contact
screens.label: Set Account Admin and Billing Contact

fields.name: accountAdminBillingContacts
fields.fieldText: Please select the contact(s) below who are the main admin and billing contact(s) for the account.

value.stringValue: AccountId = '{!newAccountId}' AND Active__c = TRUE AND Account_Admin__c = TRUE
Contacts must be associated with account, active and an account admin
AccountId = '{!newAccountId}' AND Active__c = TRUE AND (Account_Admin__c = TRUE OR Billing_Contact__c = TRUE)
Contacts must be associated with account, active and an account admin or billing contact
